title.rendered: Ivy + Bean: The Ghost That Had to Go

content.rendered:
Cold white fog. Rattling pipes. And an eerie sound from the drain. Is the school bathroom… haunted? Ivy and Bean track them down!

Director: Elissa Down

Writers: Annie Barrows(based on the books by)Jeff StockwellKathy Waugh

Stars: Keslee Blalock. Jaycie Dotin. Garfield Wilson. Marci T. House. Lidya Jewett. Madison Skye Validum. Hudson Hua. Parker Hua. Innocent Ekakitie. Nia Vardalos. Claire Smid. Jesse Gervasi. Mia SwamiNathan. Ava Marchfelder. Roman Pesino. Sailor Winter Rain Vaughan. Sasha Pieterse. Jane Lynch. Benjamin Holmes. Sara Halliburton. Noah Park
